Related repos

  • run Postgres in browser or Node with WASM
  • serves a REST API from a PostgreSQL database
  • Postgres platform for running apps and services inside the database
  • PostgreSQL client for Node.js and Deno
  • Database client for PostgreSQL, MariaDB, and SQLite

  • PostgreSQL pooler and sharding proxy for managing and scaling databases with Rust

  • Remote control for PostgreSQL instances
